name: tractive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the pulling of a heavy load (= weight carried) over a surface, or the power used in this: tractive force These vehicles provide the tractive force to haul trucks and carriages. The wagon is not heavily loaded so the tractive pull should be manageable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tractive force that pulled the vehicle round the curve was acting against centrifugal force.There was a constant tractive force on the car as it moved down the hill.The tractive unit is fitted with ramps that can lift the front of the trailer from the ground.
